The Americans is a period drama about the complex marriage of two KGB spies posing

President. The arranged marriage of Philip (Matthew Rhys) and Elizabeth Jennings
(Keri Russell), who have two children Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 13-year-old Paige (Holly Taylor) and
10-year-old Henry (Keidrich Sellati), who know nothing about their parents' true
identity Ã¢â‚¬â€œ grows more passionate and genuine by the day, but is constantly tested

of affinity for America's values and way of life. Tensions also heighten upon
the arrival of a new neighbor, Stan Beeman (Noah Emmerich), an FBI agent. Stan
and his partner, Agent Chris Amador (Maximiliano HernÃƒÂ¡ndez), are members of a new
